page.title: 15MILTON CHILDREN'S GAMES.
page.content: For recreation in Milton we play games.A favourite game at school is {High Tig.}We stand on the small wall and one child stands in front.He is 'het',and he has to try to'tig'us when we jump off the wall to run to a den and back.If he tigs you, you go 'het'. A game at the park is{Knockout.}A person with a ball tries to hit his friend who is on the swing,and if he succeeds,they change places. {Hide and Seek}is a good game round the village.One person,facing a wall, hides his eyes and counts to 50,while others hide behind gates and hedges,in old buildings or in trees and bushes. The counter goes to find each person but they try to reach his wall before he returns.If they succeed,he has to be 'het' again.This game is even more fun in the evenings when it is getting dark.
